name: Chakra Initiate
text: You have an extra wellspring of kundalini energy that you can use to open your chakras.
prerequisites: Ability to awaken the root chakra.
benefit: You gain a pool that holds 3 points of serpentfire ki, which you can use only to open or maintain chakras. These serpent-fire ki points are replenished at the same time you replenish the points in your regular ki pool.
text_zh: 你获得了额外的拙火能量源，并可以以此来开启你的脉轮。
prerequisites_zh: 觉醒海底脉轮（root chakra）的能力。
benefit_zh: 你获得存有3点蛇焰真气（serpentfire ki）的气池，而你仅能用它开启或维持脉轮。当你的常规气池（ki pool）重新回满的时候，这些蛇焰真气也会在同一时间重新充满。
